title: Dilatonic AdS-Kerr Solution to AdS/CFT Correspondence
abstract: We consider the $AdS_5$ solution deformed by a non-constant dilaton interpolating between the standard AdS (UV region) and flat boundary background (IR region). We show that this dilatonic solution can be generalized to the case of a non-flat boundaries provided that the metric of the boundaries satisfies the vacuum Einstein field equations. As an example, we describe the case when the four-dimensional boundaries represent the Kerr space-time.
